PACKAGE_DESCRIPTION: A tool that reads a Jupyter Notebook file using nbformat, converting the JSON file into a NotebookNode object.
ADDITIONAL_REQUIREMENTS: Read a notebook file from the filesystem.
Convert JSON data into a NotebookNode object.
Support different notebook versions via as_version parameter.
Log the read operation and handle errors gracefully.
Validate the notebook schema after reading.
Return the NotebookNode for further processing.
